casebody.data:
STATE
v.
J.C. 405PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 Lauren Tally Earnhardt, Willliam P. Hart, Assistant Attorney Generals, Adren Harris, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Jason C. Yoder, Attorney at Law, for J.C. State of N. C. Judicial Dept., for N.C. Judicial Department.

Amended

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of November 2017 by Petitioner to Proceed Under a Pseudonym:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."
